summary: Jon Mikl Thor was a bodybuilding, steel bending, brick smashing rock star in the 70's and 80's whose theatrical band, Thor, never quite made it big. Years later he attempts a comeback that nearly kills him.
cast: Jon Mikl Thor|John Holmstrom|Nik Turner|Jack Cione|Frank Soda|Ed Preston|Linda Dawe|Rusty Hamilton|Bruce Duff|D. Stevens|Mark Weiss|Mike Favata|Keith Zazzi|Steve Price|Michael Pilmer|Matt Muziani|Matt Seawald|Lou Ferrigno|Stewart Moralis|Don Hill|Jason Douglas|Cal Thompson|Ani Kyd Wolf|John Hartman|Katherine Elo|Frank Meyer|Ben Perman|Hampus Klang|Hell Hofer|Rodney Allen|John Fasano|John Cody Fasano|Alan Higbee|Joe Keithley|Minka|Seth Putnam|Damien Storm|Malcolm Tent|Jessie Wagner|Daniel Waters|Jason Wentworth|Rich Wentworth
title: I Am Thor
